title: BLISS Raw Cafe and Garden
typeOfFood: Vegan, Japanese, Organic, Raw, Thai, Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Asian, Catering, Fusion
description: Previously located in Hotel Norbu Sangpo in Boudha Pulbhari. Relocated within Boudha inside Main Stupa Circle. Uses organic veggies and fruit from own garden.  Practice of Ahimsa (non-violence) and spiritual conscious eating is the mission of the cafe. Menu contains 70% raw food (for advanced vegans) and 30% organic health food where light cooking is used (for beginning vegans). You will find organic salads, superfood smoothies, healthy Tibetan food and vegan snacks that are free from gluten, diary and sugar. No alcohol or cigarettes on premises.
